text: is a city in Wakayama Prefecture, Japan. The city was founded on November 11, 2005. The towns of Kishigawa, Kokawa, Momoyama, Naga and Uchita all combined to form the city. Kokawa Temple (Kokawa-ji) is a popular sightseeing spot in Kinokawa. ==Tama the stationmaster cat== Kishi Station in the city has a cat as the stationmaster named Tama. Tama is a calico cat. ==People from Kinokawa city== * Ryumon Yasuda - Painter and Sculptor ==Other websites== * Official website Category:Cities in Wakayama Prefecture
title: Kinokawa, Wakayama
